name: MacArtney/Markey LCI-90i Winch Monitoring System
description: Precision winch monitoring system for oceanographic research vessels, providing real-time measurements of wire payout, tension, and speed. Commonly used with trawl, CTD, and other deep-sea deployment winches.

specifications.display_options: Remote display, deck unit, ship integration

fields.name: timestamp_logged
fields.description: Timestamp when data was logged to file

notes: The LCI-90i is a popular winch monitoring system used across the US academic research fleet. Data files typically contain control characters (RS=0x1E, SOH=0x01) between the logged timestamp and device ID.
